import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { Pagination } from '@ark-ui/vue/pagination'
import { pagination } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(pagination)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'nav'>, Pagination.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(Pagination.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'nav'>, Pagination.RootBaseProps>>(
  Pagination.Root,
  'root',
)

export type EllipsisProps = Component<typeof Ellipsis>
export const Ellipsis = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Pagination.EllipsisBaseProps>>(
  Pagination.Ellipsis,
  'ellipsis',
)

export type ItemProps = Component<typeof Item>
export const Item = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Pagination.ItemBaseProps>>(
  Pagination.Item,
  'item',
)

export type NextTriggerProps = Component<typeof NextTrigger>
export const NextTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Pagination.NextTriggerBaseProps>
>(Pagination.NextTrigger, 'nextTrigger')

export type PrevTriggerProps = Component<typeof PrevTrigger>
export const PrevTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Pagination.PrevTriggerBaseProps>
>(Pagination.PrevTrigger, 'prevTrigger')

export {
  PaginationContext as Context,
  type PaginationContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/pagination'
